entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 06:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
